title: Community-Based Medical Career Exploration Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and clinical procedures
context.additional_context: Comparative analysis of community healthcare scenario experiences in smartphone-based VR environments versus hospital clinical simulations.

learning_goals: Identify and apply three or more communication skills required in community-based care environments
Compare and analyze three or more differences between hospital and community care environments through VR simulations
Create a one-page career plan reflecting changes in personal career preferences as a project deliverable

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
